title: FULL AP BARD MID 40% CDR | NEW META - LEAGUE OF LEGENDS

embed.description: today it was ap bard. my first three items were zhonyas morrel and abysel sceptor. this is to get the 40% cdr so we could stun as much as possible.

body: this video was seeing how op bard was with 40% cdr and if he was viable full ap in the mid lane. i think it was a success

replies.body:
I hate how people call a new META when it didn't work in ONE game, let alone many of them.

Also, if you want people staying with your streams, don't go around saying "Ware going to try and fuck some bitches up", it is not nice to talk in that manner.
bud. its a video. you dont have to watch it. thats my personality. sorry.

You could have titled this post " 6 : 8 AP bard normal game full game " to have saved me clicking it.

"Personally I thought it worked well" ... 

well I personally think you should check the damage done, enemy and ally supports out damaged you by a lot. https://gyazo.com/51954a7645ed1bd7967ed41caff98e2d

Gold earned is lowest on your team, in fact only the enemy support got less gold than you.
i tried to play it like a support mid kinda like lulu where you can assist and help set up the fights and kills
